title: Medieval Fantasy Vol.2
description: Music Pack designed for medieval, fantasy, RPG, adventure, strategy, history or open world games.
longDescription:
This pack's Epic Orchestral features are appropriate for trailers, epic adventures,, towns, exploration, deep emotions, characters and battles. 


Listen here.


It contains 69 files: 12 original tracks, loops, variations and ambients.

All you need for interactive game music.


(Check out Medieval Fantasy Vol.1)
